channel.title: Nonlagg
channel.description: How do i make my server non laggy? and also anti syi/null please help me getting this and making

item.title: Nonlagg
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:6, topic:311585”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=408033.msg3012802#msg3012802 date=1256969947]

[quote author=gangsta tony link=topic=408033.msg3012798#msg3012798 date=1256969415]
still doesnt work…
[/quote]If you follow the anti syi guide it will help a lot, and you can clean out your server a bit to get rid of some lag.

Anti SYI wouldn’t help with the lag, you need to do that yourself.
[/quote]I’m pretty sure he didn’t even read it. He posted nearly 5 minutes after I gave it to him and said, “Still doesn’t work.”

Okay, ill tell you the secret to making a server “non-laggy”. You take your run.bat, put it in the recycling bin, and empty the recycling bin. After that, you take your compile.bat, put it in the recycling bin, and empty it as well. After, do the same to your client.java. Repeat this process with all of your files until there aren’t anymore.

A+[/quote]A++ guide

Read full topic

item.title: Nonlagg
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:5, topic:311585”][quote author=gangsta tony link=topic=408033.msg3012798#msg3012798 date=1256969415]
still doesnt work…
[/quote]If you follow the anti syi guide it will help a lot, and you can clean out your server a bit to get rid of some lag.

Anti SYI wouldn’t help with the lag, you need to do that yourself.[/quote]I’m pretty sure he didn’t even read it. He posted nearly 5 minutes after I gave it to him and said, “Still doesn’t work.”

Okay, ill tell you the secret to making a server “non-laggy”. You take your run.bat, put it in the recycling bin, and empty the recycling bin. After that, you take your compile.bat, put it in the recycling bin, and empty it as well. After, do the same to your client.java. Repeat this process with all of your files until there aren’t anymore.

A+

Read full topic

item.title: Nonlagg
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Should help you with the SYI. The lag all depends on the stability of your server that you’ve downloaded. If the codes are written well, you should be fine. If they’re poorly written, sloppy, contain unnecessary garbage, etc. it’s going to be difficult to maintain.

Also bringing this:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Have Fun.
